channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Rep. George Santos Cries Out About Harsh Reality Of Life In Prison After His Sentencing For Wire Fraud
8/23: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Texas Republicans take victory lap after redistricting vote, Democrats vow to fight back; Minnesota hunting dog Bruno chases down foul balls

item.title: The Bugs Bunny Defense
item.description: Did a cartoon play a part in the death of a California man? "48 Hours" correspondent Richard Schlesinger reports.

item.title: Cracker Barrel loses almost $100 million in value after new logo release
item.description: Cracker Barrel stock plunged as much as 15% after the restaurant chain released a new logo that removes its long-time image of a man leaning against a...

item.title: The Fitbit Alibi
item.description: A suspect in a murder swears he didn’t do it – can his Fitbit prove he’s innocent? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

item.title: What to know about Tropical Storm Fernand
item.description: Dangerous heat is impacting more than 50 millions of Americans in the West this weekend, with eat alerts in effect from Arizona to Washington.

item.title: 8/19: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Many in Europe skeptical as Trump hints at deal with Putin; Reporter's Notebook: The death of "skibidi"?

item.title: WATCH: Massive oil plant explosion in Louisiana triggers evacuations

item.title: 21 hospitalized after bus carrying junior high football team crashes near Pittsburgh
item.description: A bus carrying a junior high football team to a game crashed Saturday north of Pittsburgh, sending 21 of the 28 people on board to the hospital

item.title: Texas Gov. Abbott says he’ll swiftly sign new maps on his desk that will boost GOP in 2026
item.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott has promised to sign a new congressional voting map designed to help Republicans maintain their slim majority in Congress.
